text: satyanisedhikalilekku peaya ninnalute bharyamarkku nalkiya vivahamulyam ninnalkku tiriccukittate nastappetukayum ennitt ninnal anantara natapati svikarikkukayum ceytal arute bharyamaranea nastappettat avar nalkiya vivahamulyattinu tulyamaya tuka avarkku nalkuka. ninnal visvasiccangikaricca allahuveat bhaktiyullavaravuka
